wikipedia_page.main: Dave Griffiths (born 25 May 1951) is an English footballer, who played as a full back in the Football League for Tranmere Rovers.

response: David or Dave Griffiths may refer to:
*Dave Griffiths (association footballer), footballer for Tranmere Rovers
*Dave Griffiths (musician) (born 1983), English Christian musician and guitarist
